long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
eBay does not provide a way to download the purchase history of a user account. This extension allows users to easily download purchase history with just a button click.

This extension will always be free to use and modify as per your liking. However, you are welcome to support me:

https://ko-fi.com/greencoder

Version 3.8 Update Notes (01/03/2025):
   1) Year 2025 date issue fixed
  
Version 3.7 Update Notes (09/05/2024):
   1) Updated to manifest version 3
   2) Export now includes a column for quantity as requested by one of the users

Version 3.6 Update Notes (03/12/2024):
   1) Show image URL for each line item

Version 3.5 Update Notes (03/19/2024):
   1) Option to allow tracking number. This has been tested on a very small data set which is why this is an optional feature. Will be optimized more in the future. 

Version 3.4 Update Notes (02/09/2024):
   1) Tracking Number Support: Now includes tracking numbers for pending delivery orders.

Version 3.3 update notes (02/02/2024):
   1) Removed options beyond 2017 as data beyond that year is not available.

Version 3.2 update notes (01/31/2024):
   1) Year Range Selection: Users can now select a range of years for data download. Currently, each year within the range is downloaded as a separate Excel file. Future updates may include aggregation into a single spreadsheet.
   2) Design update on the popup.

Version 3.1 update notes (01/25/2024):
   1) Added more options to allow users to download up to 5 years in the past
   2) Minor update on the code to make the sheet naming more dynamic and do automatic truncation if necessary

Version 3.0 update notes (10/11/2023):
   1) Increased the limit of number of orders to 300
   2) Fix issue where sometimes the excel export would run before the processing is complete

Version 2.9 update notes (10/06/2022):
   1) Added more optional chaining to prevent errors.

Version 2.8 update notes (10/02/2022):
   1) Plugin now supports itemized breakdown of multiple items within the same order. Before this update the order detail was always correct but it would not itemize it.
 
Version 2.7 update notes (09/25/2022):
   1) Add fix for potential bug where empty page request was received
   2) Increase the max page lookup in case empty page is not found to 40.
   3) Add support for Canada
   4) Added donation link if you want to support my work :)

Version 2.6 update notes:
   1) Dynamically detect URL for countries outside US

Version 2.5 update notes:
   1) Include support for eBay Australia

Version 2.4 update notes:
   1) Fix 2021 download issue for some users
   2) Verbiage change on the extension itself to simplify the instruction

Version 2.3 update notes:
   1) Show tracking number
   2) Close the window after the download button is clicked
   3) Programmatic changes

Version 2.2 update notes:
  1) Show order notes field
  2) Show order detail URL and order total
  3) Change the description as the users do not need to be on the purchase history page anymore. 
       They need to be on eBay and they need to be logged in. 
  4) Additional changes for Chrome extension compliance.

Version 2.1 update notes:
1) Converted the extension to API based on version 2 design change 

Version 2.0 update notes:
1)  Changed the date detection method to be more dynamic.
2) Started making changes for version 2 "v2" design of eBay purchase history page.

Version 1.9 update notes:
1)  Changed the date detection method as eBay changed the design.
2) Started migrating extension to manifest version 3 as manifest 2 will no longer be supported in 2023.
3) Minor code changes.
